Body: i have a thesis project about an android application that can make a call in diffrent wifi network.. i used wifi talkie and other similar app but it only works on same wifi network.. i want to ask if there is any solution to the application like wifi talkie to be able to make a call in different wifi network without connecting to internet.. any suggestion guys? source codes or anything that can make it possible ? i need it for documentation.. thanks a lot :)
Title: mobile voip over wifi

history.Text: i have a thesis project about an android application that can make a call in diffrent wifi network.. i used wifi talkie and other similar app but it only works on same wifi network.. i want to ask if there is any solution to the application like wifi talkie to be able to make a call in different wifi network without connecting to internet.. any suggestion guys? source codes or anything that can make it possible ? i need it for documentation.. thanks a lot :)
